extension.description: Hoverbox is a simple css based hover gallery combined with a prettyPhoto lightbox.

field.name: directory
field.label: Image Directory
field.description: Directory images will be sourced from - this is the relative directory eg images/stories/.

field.name: link
field.label: Link Behaviour
field.description: Choose the action that occurs when an image is clicked. See the demo site for instrtuctions related to the content item and blog category options.
field.option: Opens image in the same window
Opens the image in a new window

field.name: boxwidth
field.label: Width of the thumbnail container
field.description: Enter the width of the box that contains the thumbnails. If you specify 100% it will fill the entire width available to the module position you are publishing the module to.

field.name: boxposition
field.label: Thumbnail Position
field.description: This option determines whether the container that holds the thumbnails floats to the left, right within the module it is published to. Setting the float to none will mean that the main container does not float within the module position.

field.name: thumbHeight
field.label: Thumbnail Height
field.description: Set the height in px of the thumbnail.

field.name: thumbWidth
field.label: Thumbnail Width
field.description: Set the width in px of the thumbnail.

field.name: right_margin
field.label: Thumbnail Right Margin
field.description: Enter the right margin for the images. This value creates a space to the right of each image in the gallery. Set to 0 to have no margin.

fieldset.name: imageresize
fieldset.label: Hover Image Resize and Position Settings

field.name: output
field.label: Resize Hover Image?
field.description: Enable this option if you want to resize the hover image using the settings below.

field.name: img_width
field.label: Image Width
field.description: The width that the image is cropped to. No need to use px just the pixel value.

field.name: img_height
field.label: Image Height
field.description: The height that the image is cropped to in pixels.

field.name: option
field.label: Resize Method
field.description: The method you would like to use when resizing images.

field.name: hoverLeftOffset
field.label: Left Hover Offset
field.description: Position the hover image to the left or the right of the thumbnail by applying a -ve or +ve px value to this setting.

field.name: hoverTopOffset
field.label: Top Hover Offset
field.description: Position the hover image above or below the thumbnail by applying a -ve or +ve px value to this setting.

field.name: prettyPhoto
field.label: Enable prettyphoto?
field.description: Enable this option if you want to display image when clicked in a pretyyPhoto overlay. If you are using another module that includes prettyPhoto then set this option to no.

field.name: theme
field.label: Overlay Theme
field.description: Select the theme to use in the lightbox.

field.name: opacity
field.label: Overlay opacity
field.description: Set the opacity of the overlay - 1 is opaque and 0 is transparent.

field.name: resize
field.label: Resize Image?
field.description: Set this option to true if you want to be able to resize large images that are automatically scaled down to fit within the browser window.

field.name: prettyBoxTitle
field.label: Show image title?
field.description: Display the title of the image in the overlay?

field.name: prettyBoxSpeed
field.label: Overlay Speed
field.description: The speed at which the overlay appears when the image is displayed in the lightbox.

field.name: overlayGallery
field.label: Display thumbnails inside lightbox
field.description: When set to yes this will display thumbnails of other images in the gallery inside the lightbox.

field.name: cache
field.label: Caching
field.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

field.name: cache_time
field.label: Cache Time
field.description: The time before the module is recached
